member.name: DML_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC
member.summary: A generic container for a connection within a graph of DirectML operators defined by and passed to .

member.name: DML_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC.Type
member.summary: The type of graph edge. See for available types, and for where to use each type.

member.name: DML_GRAPH_EDGE_DESC.Desc
member.summary: A pointer to the graph edge description. The type of the pointed-to struct must match the value specified in Type.
